ValidationRule.description: Must enter a credit management reason if status is On Hold or Roadblock
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName ='Sales_Implementation_Case' && ( ISPICKVAL( CM_Status__c , "On Hold") || ISPICKVAL( CM_Status__c , "Roadblock - Customer") || ISPICKVAL( CM_Status__c , "Roadblock - Internal")) && ISPICKVAL( CM_Reason__c , "")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please choose a reason if the status is on hold or road block
